thread.title: AUTOMIC Launches Global DevOps Consulting Practice
thread.title_full: AUTOMIC Launches Global DevOps Consulting Practice

author: admin
title: AUTOMIC Launches Global DevOps Consulting Practice
text:
Evaluation of Metrics and Performance Indicators for DevOps 
Scalable DevOps: Advance to the next Level 
The goal of DevOps is to streamline the flow along the whole lifecycle from design, build and test, down to release, deploy and operation. Unfortunately, many DevOps initiatives remain isolated, development centric and fail to onboard the entire organization. 
In its consulting, Automic pays specific attention to the demand of IT operations towards more agility and increased automation to accelerate release activities. The company also recognizes the specific constraints and needs of many Enterprise IT organizations and help customers to achieve gradual improvements rather than rip-and-replace. 
Virtual classroom training: Onboard Dev and Ops managers in the game 
AUTOMIC today launched a virtual classroom for new DevOps Foundation Training, which is specifically designed for dev and ops management. This new innovative training program includes an interactive case study and game on the transformation of an IT organization to DevOps. 
DevOps Trivial Pursuit TM : A serious game to empower all IT Teams 
In addition to the launch of the DevOps Consulting Services, AUTOMIC is also announcing a new partnership with Hasbro on the official DevOps Trivial Pursuit TM – a modern spin on the well-known family game franchise. The DevOps Trivial Pursuit edition is packed with a compendium of questions around DevOps to help educate and excite developers and IT operations teams. 
Pricing & Availability: 
Pricing is available on-demand. 
Tweet this: 
Do you need to be more agile, responsive & fast? The @automic DevOps team is here to help transform your business. http://bit.ly/1G7v2yo 
About AUTOMIC 
AUTOMIC, a leader in business automation, helps enterprises drive competitive advantage by automating their IT and business systems - from on-premise to the Cloud, Big Data and the Internet of Things. With offices worldwide, AUTOMIC powers over 2,600 customers including Bosch, Netflix, eBay, AMC Theatres, Carphone Warehouse, ExxonMobil, BT Global Services, Société Générale, NHS SBS, General Electric and Swisscom. The company is privately held by EQT. More information can be found at www.AUTOMIC.com .
